Ansible Cheat Sheet
  • Ansible
  • Configuration_Management
Aug 12, 2019

Ansible is an open source configuration management tool. It can be used for deployment and orchestration tasks also. Ansible ie known for it’s simplicity and agentless approach to config management. This is my cheat sheet of ansible commands, role snippets, adhoc commands etc. which have come in handy over the years

Get Inventory Facts:

ansible inventory_servers -m setup
